item.title: 16 Dec 2025 10:30
item.description: Built a tiny posting interface to cross-post content from this site to elsewhere on-demand if needed. Since I exclude my daynotes in my main rss feed, this helps reduce the friction a bit if I want to push out certain sections of a daynote on a whim. Still crude and janky but seems to do the job! #indieweb ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded: Built a tiny posting interface to cross-post content from this site to elsewhere on-demand if needed. Since I exclude my daynotes in my main rss feed, this helps reduce the friction a bit if I want to push out certain sections of a daynote on a whim. Still crude and janky but seems to do the job! #indieweb ðŸ”—
